reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Power Up Your Life: These Amazon Basics Batteries Are a Game Changer!
reviews.reviewText: Let me tell you about these Amazon Basics Rechargeable AA Batteries. They are literally the little powerhouses you didn’t know you needed. I picked up a 12-pack and they’ve been an absolute lifesaver. First off, they come pre-charged – how convenient is that? You can use them straight out of the package.Their 2000 mAh capacity means they last a surprisingly long time in my gadgets – from remotes to my digital camera. And the best part? You can recharge them up to 1000 times. I've been using mine for months and they hold up just as well as those pricier brands.The environmental benefit is a big plus too. By using these, you’re cutting down on waste, making a small but significant impact. And let’s be honest, not having to constantly buy batteries is not only good for the planet, but it’s also great for your wallet.So, if you’re tired of constantly buying and throwing away batteries, these Amazon Basics ones are definitely the way to go. They’re reliable, eco-friendly, and an all-around great value. Your devices (and the planet) will thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They’re batteries. What else can I say
reviews.reviewText: The charge that each battery can hold is decent; they don’t seem to last quite as long as an energizer battery, but the price point is competitive and they can be recharged many times.We pair them with a battery case and a battery charger in a ‘battery station’, and it is very convenient. When done with a battery, we just pop it in the charger and grab a replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have these batteries now for 5 years and they still last quite awhile!
reviews.reviewText: Great little rechargeable batteries. They do take a while to charge up but once they are good to go, they last up to a month if used daily!Even to this day I still use these batteries and come in handy for the light candles that I take to events or other things around the home that don't necessarily need to be on for more than a couple of days. They worked so well I got AAA from them as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My remote control doesn't like them?
reviews.reviewText: Works fine, but when I put any of these, new or charged, to my remote control, it says my battery is getting low and needs to be changed...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Replaces nearly all my normal batteries
reviews.reviewText: This is my second order of these AA rechargeables. My first set has been going strong for a few years. I use these in flashlights, outdoor lighting(solar) and other areas where AA batteries are used. While they might not last as long (per charge) as onetime batteries like Energizer, I simply put these on a charger and they are ready to be used again & again. A great money saver. I now use both AA & AAA Amazon Basic batteries and will not go back to the expensive one use batteries. BTW, my original set is going strong after 2-3 years of use. I love these and the price is great for what you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I do not know what remote control is referring to in the rating features. You have to charge them, they do not charge or install themselves. But once installed they seem to last a decent amount of time. I can play my Xbox for the entire weekend and only need to change the batteries on the third day. During the week it will go the full five days without needing a change. I am going to order more for my other battery controlled devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Power Packed Performance with a Minor Drawback!
reviews.reviewText: These Amazon Basics Rechargeable AA NiMH Batteries have revolutionized my approach to powering devices. The 2000 mAh capacity and the ability to recharge up to 1000 times make them an eco-friendly and cost-effective choice. From TV remotes to gaming controllers, these batteries provide reliable and long-lasting power for various gadgets around the house. However, one minor drawback is the initial charge time, which can be longer compared to some other rechargeable batteries on the market. Despite this, the overall value and sustainability make these batteries a smart investment for anyone looking to reduce waste and maintain a constant power supply for their devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great combination of price, power, and longevity
reviews.reviewText: I originally purchased these batteries for my camera flash (speed light) and they were much more reliable than even brand name non-rechargeable batteries, providing consistent power to my flashes so that I didn’t have to adjust my camera settings as the batteries began to run low on power.That being said, they seemed to lack the punch and longevity of my Enloop Pro batteries, which are my default batteries for photography.They are excellent batteries for nearly everything else, and I now use them throughout the house, especially for applications where the Enloop Pro batteries might be overkill, particularly given the price.They charge quickly and hold their charge reasonably well even when not in constant use.I will definitely get these again.
El paquete llegó antes de lo esperado y en buenas condiciones

reviews.reviewTitle: Dependable Rechargeables for Everyday Power Needs!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased these rechargeable batteries, and I'm impressed. The charging process was smooth, and I haven't encountered any issues so far. While I haven't used them extensively yet, the anticipation is high, especially for our tooth brushes and other devices requiring AA batteries. I'll update this review with performance details after some use.I also found them effective in Panasonic cordless phones, outperforming the originals. In terms of quality and affordability, these batteries seem comparable to renowned brands.I appreciate the economic, functional aspects and the environmental benefits of reusability.In summary, these batteries are proving reliable, offering good value and performance. If you're in need of dependable rechargeables, these might just be the ones for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just good batteries for not much money. Have used it in lights for my bicycle and remote and they work perfect!
The package received today contains only 8 batteries in place of 12 ordered.
